SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Align
The Align widget is a layout widget that aligns its child widget's content based on the specified alignment: Alignment.START, Alignment.CENTER, or Alignment.END.
Alignment
Enum representing the alignment of a widget.
Border
Enum representing the border style of a widget.
Breadcrumbs
A widget that displays the breadcrumbs of the current view.
BuildContext
The context to use when building a widget.
Column
The Column widget is a layout widget that arranges its child widgets vertically in a column.
Container
A widget that contains another widget and aligns it within the container.
Container.Builder
A builder class for the container widget.
CrossAxisAlignment
Enum representing the cross axis alignment of a widget.
EnumeratedTable
A table that enumerates the rows.
InputWidget
The interface of a generic widget that continuously reads an input and validates it against the given predicate until the input is valid.
InvalidTableDimensionsException
Exception thrown when the table dimensions are invalid.
MainAxisAlignment
Enum representing the main axis alignment of a widget.
Menu
A widget that displays a menu with options.
MenuAction
The interface for a menu action.
MenuOption
Represents a menu option in a menu.
MultiInputWidget
The interface for a generic widget that takes multiple inputs and validates them together against the given predicate until the combination of inputs is valid.
MultiTextInput
A widget that displays multiple text input fields.
Pause
A widget that displays a pause message.
Table
A widget that draws a table from a list of TableRow.
TableRow
Represents a row in a table.
Text
A Text widget that displays a string of text with optional styling.
TextInput
A TextInput widget that represents an input field for text data.
TextInputField
Represents a text input field in a form.
TextStyle
Enum representing the text style of a widget.
VSpacer
A widget that draws an empty space.
Widget
The abstract base class that represents the description of part of the user interface.
